00016 // struct constructor
00017 Choice::Choice(QDomNode &choice) : choiceName_(),
00018 enumerations_() {
00019 
00020         QDomNodeList children = choice.childNodes();
00021         for (int i = 0; i < children.size(); ++i) {
00022 
00023                 // get name
00024                 if (children.at(i).nodeName() == QString("spirit:name")) {
00025                         choiceName_ = children.at(i).childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00026                         choiceName_ = General::removeWhiteSpace(choiceName_);
00027                 }
00028 
00029                 // get enumerations
00030                 else if (children.at(i).nodeName() == QString("spirit:enumeration")) {
00031 
00032                         // get the name of the enumeration
00033                         QString value =
00034                                         children.at(i).childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00035 
00036                         // get the attributes
00037                         QDomNamedNodeMap attributeMap = children.at(i).attributes();
00038 
00039                         QString attText = attributeMap.namedItem(QString(
00040                                         "spirit:text")).nodeValue();
00041                         QString attHelp = attributeMap.namedItem(QString(
00042                                         "spirit:help")).nodeValue();
00043 
00044                         enumerations_.append(General::Enumeration(value, attText, attHelp));
00045                 }
00046         }
00047 
00048         // name is mandatory
00049         if (choiceName_.isNull()) {
00050                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr(
00051                                 "Mandatory element spirit:name missing in spirit:choice"));
00052                 return;
00053         }
00054 
00055         // atleast 1 enumeration must be found
00056         if (enumerations_.size() < 1) {
00057                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element spirit:enumeration "
00058                                 "missing in spirit:choice"));
00059                 return;
00060         }
00061         return;
00062 }

00065 choiceName_(other.choiceName_),
00066 enumerations_(other.enumerations_) {
00067 }

00069 Choice& Choice::operator=( const Choice& other ) {
00070         if (this != &other) {
00071                 choiceName_ = other.choiceName_;
00072                 enumerations_ = other.enumerations_;
00073         }
00074         return *this;
00075 }

00077 Choice::~Choice() {
00078 }
00079 
00080 void Choice::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00081         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:choice");
00082 
00083         // if mandatory name is missing
00084         if (choiceName_.isEmpty()) {
00085                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("mandatory element name is missing in "
00086                                 "spirit:choice"));
00087         }
00088         else {
00089                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:name", choiceName_);
00090         }
00091 
00092         // if atleast one enumeration exists
00093         if (enumerations_.size() != 0) {
00094                 for (int i = 0; i < enumerations_.size(); ++i) {
00095 
00096                         // if mandatory value is missing
00097                         if (enumerations_.at(i).value_.isEmpty()) {
00098                                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory value missing in "
00099                                                 "spirit:enumeration"));
00100                         }
00101                         else {
00102                                 // open the spirit:enumeration tag
00103                                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:enumeration");
00104                         }
00105 
00106                         // if attribute exists
00107                         if (!enumerations_.at(i).attribute_text_.isEmpty()) {
00108                                 writer.writeAttribute("spirit:text",
00109                                                 enumerations_.at(i).attribute_text_);
00110                         }
00111 
00112                         // if attribute exists
00113                         if (!enumerations_.at(i).attribute_help_.isEmpty()) {
00114                                 writer.writeAttribute("spirit:help",
00115                                                 enumerations_.at(i).attribute_help_);
00116                         }
00117 
00118                         // write the enumeration value and close the enumeration-tag
00119                         writer.writeCharacters(enumerations_.at(i).value_);
00120                         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:enumeration
00121                 }
00122         }
00123         else {
00124                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element spirit:enumeration"
00125                                 " is missing in spirit:choice"));
00126         }
00127         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:choice
00128         return;
00129 }

00143 void Choice::setEnumerations(QList<General::Enumeration>& enumerations) {
